Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen AI merely gives feedbacks about general and common mistakes and has no ability to put our writing in an appropriate context to assess it. By contrast, my teacher can clearly explain what is going on in my writing ( mistakes by context/how to use formal tone following the kind of papers).

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
Gen AI : just improve because it is a common knowledge and I accidentally forgot. 
Feedback from my teacher is worthy, which can enhance my skill set in completing my assignments.
